course_description: This course is intended for students with an interest in financial institutions and regulatory compliance, specifically those thinking about practicing in this area and who wish to prepare for jobs in the field. While corporations and industries have long faced regulatory burdens, the world of regulatory compliance by financial services companies as it relates to consumer protection is new within the last few years, is experiencing a boom, but is here to stay.
